{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
knn =  KNearestNeighbors(5, distance_metric = "standard")

knn.fit(X_train, y_train)

pred = knn.predict(X_test)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
 accuracy(y_test, pred)

0.9433962264150944
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
knn =  KNearestNeighbors(5, distance_metric = "weighted KNN")

knn.fit(X_train, y_train)

pred = knn.predict(X_test)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
 accuracy(y_test, pred)

0.9433962264150944
